advancedperipherals.name: 高级外设
advancements.advancedperipherals.base_to: 获得红石接口、库存管理器及能源检测器。没有这些你怎么能玩下去呢?
advancements.advancedperipherals.end_aut: 强大的你（确信）能用它写一段无需GPS就可以获取当前坐标的代码吗?
advancements.advancedperipherals.husband: 这个核心是无麸质的吗?
advancements.advancedperipherals.nbt_too: 获得NBT存储及方块读取器。全世界的秘密已经向您敞开!
advancements.advancedperipherals.overpow: 你能掌控如此强大的力量吗?
advancements.advancedperipherals.root.de: 每一次旅程都从这个方块开始...
advancements.advancedperipherals.sense_t: 获得地理扫描仪和环境探测器。无限的观测能力!
item.advancedperipherals.overpowered_end: 过载的末地自动化核心
item.advancedperipherals.overpowered_hus: 过载的畜牧自动化核心
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.block_r: &7读取普通电脑无法读取的方块的NBT数据
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.chunk_c: &7 制作区块加载海龟的配件。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.colony_: &7读区您的Minecollonies殖民地和公民的数据。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.compute: &7这个工具以前用于调整我们的设备。 目前它只是一个蓝色的无用扳手。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.disable: &c此物品已被禁用, 您可以制作它, 但不会起任何作用
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.end_aut: &7海龟的升级插件, 允许其在世界上进行基本交互和维度内传送.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.energy_: &7可以检测能量流速并充当电阻。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.geo_sca: &7扫描周围的区域, 也许会找到一些闪亮的矿石?
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.husband: &7海龟的升级插件, 允许其在世界上进行基本交互并能与动物进行更高级的交互.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.invento: &7这个方块可以从玩家库存中递送或拿取指定的物品.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.me_brid: &7ME网关可以与您的Applied Energistics系统交互
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.memory_: &7可以保存并给予库存管理器玩家背包的交互权限。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.nbt_sto: &7Acts like a storage disk. Can store nbt based data.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.overpow: &7Improved version of the end automata core, that provides some overpowered uses! Be careful, the upgrade is very fragile.
&7Improved version of the husbandry automata core, that provides some overpowered uses! Be careful, the upgrade is very fragile.
&7Improved version of the weak automata core, that provides some overpowered uses! Be careful, the upgrade is very fragile.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.periphe: &7An empty hull without the love it deserves. Used as a crafting ingredient
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.player_: &7This peripheral can be used to interact with players, but don't be a stalker.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.redston: &7This block is able to interact with redstone. Works exactly like the redstone api of an computer.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.rs_brid: &7The RS Bridge interacts with Refined Storage to manage your items.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.weak_au: &7Upgrade for turtles, which makes turtles more useful.
text.advancedperipherals.added_player: Added you to the memory card
text.advancedperipherals.automata_core_f: You're trying to feed an entity to a soul, but your own body refuses to do this. Maybe something more mechanical can do this?
